blog.name: generic-insane-fangirl
blog.title: A Fandom A Day
blog.description:
Mostly shitposting and anime memes with a touch of salt. 
I am into so many cartoons and animes that I can't even list them all. 
I don't tag very often, so just know that you may see some untagged nsfw stuff.
Dont try and tell me what to ship and we won't have any problems.

tags: vool shit i found in my storage room
summary:
I was digging around in my storage and look what I found. 
It's a retro marvel lunch box!! It has all the cool dudes like...
body:
I was digging around in my storage and look what I found.

It’s a retro marvel lunch box!! It has all the cool dudes like Spiderman, Thor, and Captain America.

Iron Man and Falcon

Bruce Banner/ The Hulk

Dare Devil, Scarlet Witch, and Yellowjacket

Some barely visible Hawkeye, Vison, and The Wasp

And of course The Fantastic Four!

Now I know what you’re thinking, “Well that’s cool and all but is there anything inside the lunchbox?” And the answer is HELL YEAH THERE IS!!

First we have a super cool Thermos with all ya favorite boi’s on it

Including the Goofiest Thor Ever ™

And a bag of old Star wars Pez dispensers. Just look at this smug fuck

Y'all don’t understand how grotesque this guy is, my shitty camera just doesn’t do him justice.

But all in all, a pretty fun find.

tags: im too broke to go and ask these at a convention
i dont even live in the US
summary: So i realized that Bruce spent time in India and my brown girl brain had to ask...
body:
So i realized that Bruce spent time in India and my brown girl brain had to ask…

@markruffalo I have some important questions for you:

1. If Bruce spent all that time in Calcutta, did he ever watch any Bollywood movies? What was his guilty pleasure?

2. Have you seen any Bollywood movies, and if so, what’s your favourite/most memorable?

Thank you

summary: hello hello !! i’ve seen a lot of these around, so i (being the copycat i am) decided to start my own ! rules must be following...
caption:
hello hello !! i’ve seen a lot of these around, so i (being the copycat i am) decided to start my own !

rules

  • must be following me
  • reblog this post
  • send me your name and your top 3 characters from marvel ! ( and be sure to check the page to see who’s taken. )
  • track the tag #laurensfam to post creations, selfies, promos, etc !

blog.name: shewolf7t
blog.title: Carpe Diem 😜🤘
blog.description: Life is hard, don't try to survive it, LIVE it.

body:
Startcrossed Lovers Pt. 2

As he approached the truck he saw how peaceful and content you were.

“So, this is what you do on your free time?” He noted, making you realize someone was coming. Knowing clearly who it was you, smiled widely.

“Most girls, party or stay in I suppose, but then again, I’m not most girls. What are you doing here anyway? Shouldn’t you be in bed sleeping or out on a pub??”

He simply replied, “C'mon, I only go out when it’s with you, I don’t know Arizona, remember? Plus, I wouldn’t miss this for the world. When else will I get a chance to look at a shooting star and make my wish?”

“Fair point, how’d you find me anyway? Stalker.” You teased.

“I remembered this is one of your favorite places, I was gonna call you to ask but I sort of wanted this to be a surprise.”

Eagerly you told him, “I’m surprised, now friend. What did you bring me!?”

He laughed at her excitement, this was her. This was the girl that occupied his mind and heart on a daily basis. The one he was sure he was in love with because he had never had such strong feelings for a person. The one who, when he saw would make his palms sweaty and his stomach twirl. Many times he had imagined what it would be like to be with you. To call you his, and everytime reality hit him like a cold slap in the face. He lived over 5,000 miles away, there was one ocean between your worlds. Yet, you were so passionate and loving, kind and sweet. You made his days better… if only you knew.

Out of his daydream he smiled and stated, “I brought coffee and donuts, I didn’t forget your gift but I will give it to you tomorrow. I know if I give it to you today I won’t get time with you tomorrow so you’re gonna have to wait.”

“Fine, just get in here loser. The stars don’t wait on anyone.”

As he jumped on the bed of the truck he took a seat next to you and provided you with the goodies he brought. You had to admit, this was surprising. Star gazing was always something you did on your own. For many reasons, but the main one being that you hated having to explain the constellations and stars, you hated having the peace disrupted when these were your happy moments. You were not disturbed by Tom’s presence though. He always made things better in a way. “So what are we watching?”

You rolled your eyes, “Currently we’re just waiting, in about an hour or so, magic will happen.”

“So, if it’s not going to start until an hour, and I’m assuming you’ve been here for a while, what exactly is the reason why you come so early?”

“Me time” you simply stated.

“Oh my gosh! Am I disturbing your peace? I’m so sorry, I just wanted to spend some time with you since we don’t see each other all the time. I didn’t know!” He was freaking out. All he wanted was some time with you and now he felt like a jerk for interrupting the few hours you get of peace with yourself.

“Dude, chill out. I come here mostly to think, and to start over. You haven’t ruined anything, I didn’t invite you because nobody really enjoys this like I do. You just got out a twelve hour flight, I didn’t think you’d like to spend it here looking at the sky.”

“You know,” he stated, “Any time I get with you is always amazing. It doesn’t matter what we do, as long as it’s time with you.”

“Aww Tom! You’re such a sweetheart.”

“I know!” He chuckles. “If you don’t mind me asking though, what were you thinking about?”

“Just life, how it hasn’t turned out the way I thought it would. How I want something I can’t have, and it kind of hurts…”

Putting his arms around you he says, “What is it? If I can buy you the world, I will just to make you happy”

Those simple words were kind, but they made you think. Could you be that important to him? He can have anyone he wants, could you be what he wants? Or is this just a friendly gesture? Maybe you’re looking too much into this…

summary: Lately, I`ve been listening to a lot of “old” music (70`s, 80`s, 90`s hits) and, combined with some Twitch streams I stumbled...
caption:
Lately, I`ve been listening to a lot of “old” music (70`s, 80`s, 90`s hits) and, combined with some Twitch streams I stumbled upon, I decided to draw old, original designs of X-Men.

Don`t ask how, it all made sence at that point.

Anyways, here`s Wonderwall Gambit!

blog.description:
[REQUESTS ARE OPEN] hi! My names Jillian ✨I write fanfic and stuff.

masterlist

title: The Dream - Peter Parker
body:
summary : Y/N and Peter could see the day when they would meet, their soulmate bond made that possible. They were both from completely opposite sides of the pond. Peter was from New York, and Y/N was being raised in the Red Room. Neither of them ever thought they would meet their soulmates, until the day they did.

word count : 912

warnings : probably a lot of angst, cursing, some PTSD from the reader, violence, mentions of death, fluff near the end, but really just a lot of angst

pairing / characters : Peter Parker x inhuman!reader, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanoff, Sam Wilson, Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, mentions of Daisy Johnson,

prompt : Some soulmates had different connections to their S/O, but then their were those that could see the future, the day when they would finally meet one another. They’re never given the time, or the day. Just the place and the person.

A/N : part 1/? Also this is very short, sorry. But the parts will get longer as they progress.

series masterlist

New masterlist | requests | prompt list

tags : @optimisticheartyouth @uzum4k1-uch1h4

Y/N had been having the same dream for years now, but she really didn’t think it was a dream.

It always started out in the same way, screaming, the sound of fighting, and someone shouting her name. It was always placed in the Red Room, the place where she was brainwashed, trained, and basically tortured. The building was in shambles, and she had no clue why.

She always saw a boy in her dreams, wearing a blue and red suit with a giant spider in the center of it. Y/N never saw the boys face, and never heard his voice but she knew that they were connected somehow.

In the Red Room the talk of soulmates was frowned upon, and if you were caught talking about it you would be punished. Y/N never spoke of her dreams to anyone. She wondered if it were true, she wondered if soulmates were a real thing in the world.

She always hoped that when she had graduated and left the Red Room, she would meet this mystery person who clouded her dreams, but she also hoped she wouldn’t. She was made into a monster, and she wasn’t even sure if anyone would ever want her. Even her soulmate.

The dreams seemed to be happening every night, until the night everything changed for her, when she was more scared for her life than ever.

Peter Parker was the worlds newest and greatest superhero. Girls and guys alike swooned over the masked hero wanting him, and others wanted to be him. Peter was very proud of what he had become, how much he had overcome and faced.

Even with being a masked hero he was still a teenage boy who was going to school and waiting for his soulmate. His Aunt May would always tell him her story about how she met his Uncle, how it was basically love at first sight. Of course Peter thought that was over doing it a bit, but how would he know? He hadn’t met his soulmate yet.

A lot of kids at Midtown High had already met their soulmates, there were some that hadn’t but it seemed like everyone was meeting theirs sooner than Peter ever would.

For a long time Peter thought he didn’t have a soulmate, he thought the universe just didn’t want him to find his other half. That was until he started having the same dream every night.

The first night he just thought it was a dream, a normal dream like the rest of them. And then the nights went on and he kept having the same dream. Peter waited a week to tell Aunt May, too scared to hear what she would say. He knew there were different soulmate attachments. Some people had tattoos of their significant others favorite thing, some had the first words of their significant other tattooed to their arms. There were so many different possibilities, but Peter didn’t know if his was a soulmate attachment or not.

When Peter told his aunt he thought she’d tell him it was just a dream, but she didn’t. She didn’t tell him that.

“Peter, your ‘dreams’ aren’t dreams at all.” May had no idea how she would explain this to Peter, he already looked confused and scared as it was. May sighed, “Peter you and you’re soulmate are connected through this dream, but it’s really showing you two when you are going to meet. You’re basically seeing the future.” May said.

At first Peter didn’t believe her, but again as the nights went on and the dream was the only thing he saw in his sleep, he became to believe the words his aunt had told him.

Peter never knew where his dream took place, he never knew when it took place, but all he knew was this. There was screaming, so much screaming, gunshots, a building that was falling apart in some areas, and a girl. A girl that was curled up in a corner. He never heard her voice when her mouth moved, he never got her name through the dream, but he could see her face. He knew what his soulmate looked like and all he wanted now was to find her.

Peter’s only worry was did she know who he was? Did she know him, his alter ego, or both? Who did she see in her dreams?
body_abstract:
summary : Y/N and Peter could see the day when they would meet, their soulmate bond made that possible. They were both from completely opposite sides of the pond. Peter was from New York, and Y/N was being raised in the Red Room. Neither of them ever thought they would meet their soulmates, until the day they did.

word count : 912

warnings : probably a lot of angst, cursing, some PTSD from the reader, violence, mentions of death, fluff near the end, but really just a lot of angst

pairing / characters : Peter Parker x inhuman!reader, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanoff, Sam Wilson, Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Wanda Maximoff, mentions of Daisy Johnson,

prompt : Some soulmates had different connections to their S/O, but then their were those that could see the future, the day when they would finally meet one another. They’re never given the time, or the day. Just the place and the person.

summary:
[ OPEN to any role playing superhero! Marvel/Dc/Oc ] ~ ~
~
"Gotcha dirtbag..." I say aloud before leaping and [ THWIP! ] hitting...
caption:
[ OPEN to any role playing superhero! Marvel/Dc/Oc ] ~ ~
~
“Gotcha dirtbag…” I say aloud before leaping and [ THWIP! ] hitting a building top billboard with a web thread, the pendulum like momentum swinging me down between two rows of stopped traffic. Drivers and passengers alike, stick their heads out windows in hopes to catch a better peek as a red and blue streak zooms past. After flipping out of my latest swing, I lands on a pizzeria awning before trampolining up and onto a street light that spans out over the road. It’s then, with my mask eyes narrowing that I quickly crawl across the arm and take aim, [ THWIP! ] hitting the fleeing crook in the back with a web thread before moonsaulting off down towards the intersection below. As I come down to street level, the crook goes up as if on a weighing scale, the criminal now dangling helplessly while thrashing about. “Curse you Spider-Man!!” He hollers, shaking his fist in anger as I jump up to grab the dangling purse which was snatched moments earlier. After spinning the purse around my finger several times, I chuck it over to an elderly lady who clutches it after making the catch, a smile of gratitude now splayed across her face. “Oh calm down loser..” I then reply while reassuring the elderly lady with a comforting gesture. “It looks like you’ll be sticking around til the cops get here. So til then, just hang out.. See what I did there?.. Hmmm.. Not my best material.. Maybe if I approach it from another dangle??.. Still nothing huh??… I swear, sometimes I just waste comedy gold..” With the petty burglar subdued, I quickly ascend a nearby building via crawl before taking a seat on it’s ledge, feet kicking somewhat playfully as I keep a lookout. “Ok Big Apple… What'cha got next?”
~
~
#spiderman #spidey #peterparker #marvel #dc #marvelcomics #ironspider #spidermanhomecoming #comics #comicart #captainamerica #tomholland #blackpanther #batman #superman #avengers #theavengers #infinitywar #avengersinfintywar #newyork #newyorkcity #mcu
~
~
Art by Reilly Brown

After spinning the purse around my finger several times, I chuck it over to an elderly lady who clutches it after making the catch, a smile of gratitude now splayed across her face. “Oh calm down loser..” I then reply while reassuring the elderly lady with a comforting gesture. “It looks like you’ll be sticking around til the cops get here. So til then, just hang out.. See what I did there?.. Hmmm.. Not my best material.. Maybe if I approach it from another dangle??.. Still nothing huh??… I swear, sometimes I just waste comedy gold..” With the petty burglar subdued, I quickly ascend a nearby building via crawl before taking a seat on it’s ledge, feet kicking somewhat playfully as I keep a lookout. “Ok Big Apple… What'cha got next?”
~
~

~
~
Art by Reilly Brown
trail.content:
[ OPEN to any role playing superhero! Marvel/Dc/Oc ] ~ ~
~
“Gotcha dirtbag…” I say aloud before leaping and [ THWIP! ] hitting a building top billboard with a web thread, the pendulum like momentum swinging me down between two rows of stopped traffic. Drivers and passengers alike, stick their heads out windows in hopes to catch a better peek as a red and blue streak zooms past. After flipping out of my latest swing, I lands on a pizzeria awning before trampolining up and onto a street light that spans out over the road. It’s then, with my mask eyes narrowing that I quickly crawl across the arm and take aim, [ THWIP! ] hitting the fleeing crook in the back with a web thread before moonsaulting off down towards the intersection below. As I come down to street level, the crook goes up as if on a weighing scale, the criminal now dangling helplessly while thrashing about. “Curse you Spider-Man!!” He hollers, shaking his fist in anger as I jump up to grab the dangling purse which was snatched moments earlier. After spinning the purse around my finger several times, I chuck it over to an elderly lady who clutches it after making the catch, a smile of gratitude now splayed across her face. “Oh calm down loser..” I then reply while reassuring the elderly lady with a comforting gesture. “It looks like you’ll be sticking around til the cops get here. So til then, just hang out.. See what I did there?.. Hmmm.. Not my best material.. Maybe if I approach it from another dangle??.. Still nothing huh??… I swear, sometimes I just waste comedy gold..” With the petty burglar subdued, I quickly ascend a nearby building via crawl before taking a seat on it’s ledge, feet kicking somewhat playfully as I keep a lookout. “Ok Big Apple… What'cha got next?”
~
~

blog.name: dictionarywrites
blog.title: Dictionary Writes
blog.description:
Here in the most grudging manner possible until more people make the sensible choice and come to Dreamwidth instead. This blog is 18+ only: minors don't interact.

Find me on Dreamwidth or Ao3!

summary: honestly though, despite how close they are and how much they love each other, the extent to which thor and loki harm one...
body:
honestly though, despite how close they are and how much they love each other, the extent to which thor and loki harm one another by trying to protect each other is like… grossly unhealthy

thor continuously and regularly assumes loki will agree with him/come with him on his risky decisions, regardless of the risk to his person; thor continuously acts in protection of loki without asking if it’s what loki really wants - thor never asks if loki WANTS to go to midgard etc, he just assumes loki will, because thor tends to think the best place for loki is at his side, and he relies on himself to protect loki even though loki is generally hated by everyone around them.

and loki for his part like, won’t ever tell thor about his anxieties, his fears, or even his issues with THOR, so that thor won’t go through the emotional difficulty of knowing loki’s burdens. loki keeps extremely dangerous secrets from thor so that he won’t be burdened, and ultimately they blow up in his face. in turn, this often comes across as his having BETRAYED thor, when most of the time it’s just loki trying to keep him from being worried or upset.

i LOVE thor and loki, but to pretend their relationship is 100% a healthy one kind of does them an injustice. it doesn’t mean they are bad people, or that they are bad to one another, simply bc their relationship is unhealthy, and it doesn’t mean they aren’t trying their best.

and loki for his part like, won’t ever tell thor about his anxieties, his fears, or even his issues with THOR, so that thor won’t go through the emotional difficulty of knowing loki’s burdens. loki keeps extremely dangerous secrets from thor so that he won’t be burdened, and ultimately they blow up in his face. in turn, this often comes across as his having BETRAYED thor, when most of the time it’s just loki trying to keep him from being worried or upset.
